import React, { useState } from "react" import "./register.css" import axios from "axios" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import Firstpage from "../main/firstpage" const Register = () => { const history = useHistory() const [ user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", address:"", phoneno:"", age:"", vaccinated:"", lifestyledisease:"", district:"", village:"", ward:"", email: "", password: "", reEnterPassword: "" }) const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } const register = () => { const { name, email, password, reEnterPassword } = user if( name && email && password && (password === reEnterPassword)){ axios.post("http://localhost:1000/api/auth/register", user) .then( res => { alert(res.data.message) history.push("/login") }) } else { alert("invalid input") } } return ( <>
{console.log("User", user)}
